sections.text:
1-149.Disciplinary action; appeal; procedure.

Any decision of the board may be appealed, and the appeal shall be in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act.

SourceLaws 1957, c. 1, ยง 44, p. 70;Laws 1988, LB 352, ยง 1.

Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
